---

##  [How to get rid of the auto-generated #region for implemented interfaces](<http://blogs.clariusconsulting.net/kzu/how-to-get-rid-of-the-auto-generated-region-for-implemented-interfaces/> "How to get rid of the auto-generated #region for implemented interfaces")

March 13, 2008 7:50 pm

I HATE this default so much. Every stupid interface gets its own #region in my code file. I wonder who thought regions were so coolâ€¦ 

Anyway, just go to Tools -> Options and please-please turn it off!!!

![image](http://www.clariusconsulting.net/images/blogs/kzu/Howtogetridoftheautogeneratedregionforim_ECC6/image.png)

And please-please-please-please [VOTE TO MAKE IT OFF BY DEFAULT](<https://connect.microsoft.com/VisualStudio/feedback/ViewFeedback.aspx?FeedbackID=332931> "MS Connect Bug Report")!!!

![](http://www.clariusconsulting.net/aggbug.aspx?PostID=58374)

Posted by kzu
